instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PP0V75_S0_DDRVTT: What is PP0V75_S0_DDRVTT? PP0V75_S0_DDRVTT is a 0.75v power rail present when the machine is in an S0 working state .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> 2 spots of liqued damage but now only beeps 3 times on ram
threads.message:
Hi all,

got a <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> in with waterdamage,

small drop on <RESISTOR>R7986</RESISTOR> replaced now has 5,0k
and small drop on <CAPACITOR>C3890</CAPACITOR>

replaced multiple ram sticks in both slots. only 1slot at a time.
read and uploaded bios, no result.
voltage is 1.5 volt on <SIGNAL>PP1V5_S3_DDR</SIGNAL>

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> 2 spots of liqued damage but now only beeps 3 times on ram
threads.message: Must be corrosion somewhere else if no one fucked with it. Crap under/in RAM slots? Checked 0V75 to the RAM?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> 2 spots of liqued damage but now only beeps 3 times on ram
threads.message:
ram slots look clean.

                                                       NO RAM           with ram
<SIGNAL>PP0V75_S3_MEM_VREFDQ_A</SIGNAL>   0.750v              0.758v
<SIGNAL>PP0V75_S3_MEM_VREFCA_A</SIGNAL>    0.751v             0.753v
<SIGNAL>PP0V75_S0_DDRVTT</SIGNAL>                    0.750v             0.744v

<RESISTOR>R3140</RESISTOR>  10.32k
<RESISTOR>R3141</RESISTOR> 9.98k

<CAPACITOR>C3111</CAPACITOR>  pin 1     0.126diode

<RESISTOR>R2940</RESISTOR>  9.99k
<RESISTOR>R2941</RESISTOR>  9.85k

<CAPACITOR>C2910</CAPACITOR>    0.126 diode
